sense.name: person who is an official advocate
sense.examples: Senator Smith is the sponsor of the new highway bill in congress. You must have a sponsor to nominate you for membership at the yacht club. Mary has been a sponsor of several immigrant families.

sense.name: person or organization that is a financial backer
sense.examples: For only $100 you can become a sponsor of the orchestra. We'll be back after a word from our sponsors. Several local businesses are major sponsors of the annual charity drive.
